description:
### Only Even Numbers

Write a function onlyEvenNumbers that takes two integers l and r as inputs. The function should generate an array of integers from l to r (inclusive) and return only the even numbers from this array.

Input: Two integers l, r (1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ 1000).
Output: An array of even integers from l to r (inclusive).

Example:

```js onlyEvenNumbers(5, 10); // [6, 8, 10] ```
